dialogue.htmlContent: Knowing that this is a dangerous area, you make sure to stay alert as you navigate your way through the caves. Thanks to your awareness, you catch sight of a figure sneaking towards you in your peripheral vision. Turning towards them, you see that the figure is [npc.a_fullRace(true)], and, expecting the worst, you jump back into a fighting stance.

[npc.speech(Well, well, well!)] [npc.she] states, placing [npc.her] [npc.hands] on [npc.her] [npc.hips+] and striking a confident pose. [npc.speech(What do we have here? Someone who's walking through my territory without my permission?)]

Before you can reply to [npc.name], [npc.she] continues, [npc.speech(You can't just be walking around in my territory for free, you understand? Either you hand over some cash, right now, or else I'll make you!)]

#IF(npc.isAttractedTo(pc)) Your powerful arcane aura is clearly turning [npc.herHim] on, and from [npc.her] hungry gaze that lingers on your body, you're able to get a good idea of what [npc.she] wants to do with you. #IF(game.isNonConEnabled()) Knowing that defeat will result in being raped by this horny [npc.race], you ready yourself for a fight. #ELSE Knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with you, you ready yourself for a fight. #ENDIF #ELSE Although your powerful arcane aura is turning [npc.herHim] on a little, it doesn't look as though [npc.sheIs] really all that interested in your body, and will most likely only rob you if you were to lose this fight. #ENDIF

Please, just take my money and leave me alone!)] #ELSE #IF(pc.isConfident()) Not wanting to waste your time dealing with this pathetic [npc.race], you produce a handful of flames, before confidently stepping forwards and holding them out to the mugger. [pc.speech(Here's your money. Now step aside and let me pass.)] #ENDIF #ENDIF

[npc.speech(Give that to me!)] [npc.name] snaps, [npc.her] desire to rob you of your money obviously the motivating factor behind [npc.her] assault. Before you can reply, [npc.she] quickly steps forwards, before snatching the flames out of your [pc.hand]. With a mocking laugh, [npc.she] stands aside and sneers, [npc.speech(Now get out of my sight!)]

#IF(pc.isBrave()) With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, making sure to keep an eye on [npc.name] in case [npc.she] tries following you. Thankfully for [npc.herHim], it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and you soon turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ELSEIF(pc.isCowardly()) With the conflict now resolved, you hurry on your way, hoping that [npc.name] doesn't pursue you and demand more money. Quickly retreating around a corner, you thankfully leave the [npc.race] behind, breathing a sigh of relief as you reflect on the fact that you just came close to having a violent confrontation. #ELSE With the conflict now resolved, you continue on your way, giving [npc.name] one last backwards glance to make sure [npc.she] isn't going to follow you. Thankfully, it looks like [npc.sheIs] more concerned with counting out [npc.her] ill-gotten gains than attempting to make any sort of threatening move, and after just a moment, you turn a corner and leave the [npc.race] behind. #ENDIF

Wanting to avoid a fight, and unwilling to hand over any of your money, you decide to do the only other thing you can think of, and flash a seductive smile at [npc.name]. [pc.speech(There's no need to fight. If you're looking for a bit of fun, all you have to do is ask...)]
